t: Dorel Announces Financing Transaction – Dorel Industries
s: Monetization of Company-owned factory in Columbus, Indiana Montréal, February 21, 2025 — Dorel Industries Inc. (TSX: DII.B, DII.A) announced today that it has entered into a sale-leaseback transaction for its factory and warehousing facility in Columbus, Indiana.
